attributes.action: Ask the government to provide more funds to local authoritys to create more youth clubs or meeting places for young people to meet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We  request more facilites for young people to meet in a social setting in all local autoritys so as to cut down on anti social behaviour and problems on the streets,Young people are bored of no were to go and no one intrested in there views.

rejection.details: Thank you however there is a petition on a similar theme: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Youth-Club/ Please consider signing this prior to resubmission.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
